name: Campaign Template Pre-Generation Notification
description: Sent out one week prior to Campaign Template generation.
subject: Reminder: Your Certification Campaign is Scheduled to Start in 7 Days
body:
Dear ${__recipient.name},

The certification $campaignTemplateName is scheduled to generate a campaign in 7 days. If you need to make any changes or updates to the contents of this campaign, please do so before ${generationDate}.
Thanks,
The $__global.productName Team
